channel.title: SevenAtSevenPolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from SevenAtSevenPolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Rep. McIver returns to ICE facility months after assault charges
item.description: Rep. LaMonica McIver made another stop at the Delaney Hall Detention Facility in New Jersey to repeat her calls to close it.

item.title: Why Bing Crosby’s ‘White Christmas’ Still Warms Our Hearts
item.description: The America of 1942 was vastly different from the America we know today, but its longings remain the same.

item.title: Prominent Rhode Island Democrat caught on video telling officer, 'You know who I am?' during DUI stop

item.title: Pentagon to send 350 National Guard troops to New Orleans as violent crime surges ahead of major events
item.description: More than 300 national Guard troops will assist law enforcement in New Orleans through Mardi Gras as officials work to combat rising violent crime.

item.title: Why We Still Love the Yule Log
item.description: Sixty Christmases ago, the icon made its television debut — and it’s still a backdrop to our holidays.

item.title: The Miraculous Song Sung Blue
item.description: Craig Brewer celebrates Neil Diamond’s ecumenical working-class pop.

item.title: The CDC’s Hepatitis B Vaccine Decision Is Wrongheaded and Illogical
item.description: When vaccine guidance shifts without evidence, confusion rises — and more children are put at risk.

item.title: Resolutions for Overcoming a Bad Year
item.description: For most of us, the resolutions we need to make to bounce back from a difficult year don’t have to be hyperspecific.

item.title: President Trump’s ‘Golden Fleet,’ a Welcome Change
item.description: It is a relief to hear a president give more than lip service to what has become a crisis for our ability to project power.

item.title: Meet The Saint Who Shaped The Modern Nativity Scene
item.description: 'Then His mother took Him to her heart, and with her cheek and breast warmed Him with great joy, and a mother’s tender compassion.'

item.title: Millionaire tax plans spread as Washington state eyes new levy
item.description: Democrats across the US are increasingly exploring taxes as a way to capture the populist moment and address the country’s widening wealth gap.

item.title: Democrats warn Trump greenlighting Nvidia AI chip sales could boost China’s military edge
item.description: Congressional Democrats oppose NVIDIA's advanced H200 chip sales to China, with lawmakers calling the decision a threat to U.S. military security.

item.title: Inside the White House Christmas card tradition – from Coolidge to Trump
item.description: The history of the White House Christmas card list is long, unique, with annual messages as distinct as the former presidents themselves.

item.title: Obama’s former top economic advisor says he feels ‘a tiny bit bad’ for Trump because gas prices are low, but consumer confidence is still plummeting
item.description: “Consumers are just in this, whatever the highest price is, is the price they're going to focus on,” Harvard professor Jason Furman said.
